game.name: Blocks and Bones
game.categories: Single-player, Includes level editor, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Blocks and Bones is a zombie wave shooter with endless hordes of the undead in custom maps built by players. Build mode is the sandbox side of the game where you build levels from blocks and publish them online in-game so other players can survive the apocalypse inside your chilling creations.
